Plot: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.
Title: The Libertine
Actors: Johnny Depp, Paul Ritter, John Malkovich, Stanley Townsend
tomatoConsensus: Despite Johnny Depp's zealous performance, muddled direction and murky cinematography hinder The Libertine.
